00019 //a limit on the maximal number of signals per wire
00020 //Frankly, speaking this is mainly such that we can squeeze the
00021 //sequence of (useless) booleans of the starttime indicator
00022 //for a given measurement into a 32 bit word. But a wire with 32 signals is really doubtful
00023 //I'd say 
00024 #define RINGCHNLIMIT 32

00069       BmlEventData() {
00070         //do some initialization
00071         setBoardID(0);

00075         setNumberOfWords(0);

00077         setEventNumber(0); 
00078         setStatus(0); 
00079         setEventDataCounter(0);
00080         setNumberOfSignalChannels(0);
00081         _bml_event_sup = new BmlEventDataSup;
00082         _isSupInitialised=true;
00083       };

00106   void addSupplementaryInformation(LCEvent* aEvt, unsigned int ielm) {
00107     //Try to retrieve the supplementary information
00108     
00109     if(_bml_event_sup) delete _bml_event_sup;
00110     try {
00111       LCCollection* gentdcsupcol(aEvt->getCollection(COL_TDCSUP));
00112       //std::cout << "BmlEventSup Collection Size: " << gentdcsupcol->getNumberOfElements() << std::endl;
00113       _bml_event_sup = new BmlEventDataSup(gentdcsupcol->getElementAt(ielm));
00114       //_bmlEventDataSup(aEvt->getCollection(COL_TDCSUP)->getElementAt(ielm));
00115       _isSupInitialised=true;
00116     } catch (lcio::DataNotAvailableException err) {
00117       if(!_isWarning3Printed) {
00118         std::cout << "Warning: BmlEventData - Supplementary information not contained in event: " << aEvt->getEventNumber() << " of run: " << aEvt->getRunNumber() << std::endl;
00119         _isWarning3Printed=true;
00120       }
00121     }
00122     
00123   }

00247   std::string getTDCType() {
00248     std::string retStr(CAEN_767);
00249     if(_isSupInitialised) retStr=_bml_event_sup->getTDCType();
00250     else { 
00251       if(!_isWarning1Printed) {
00252         std::cout << "BmlEventData - Info/Warning: Object containing supplementary information not initialised. Will return default: " << CAEN_767 <<  " which might be what you want, please verify."  << std::endl;
00253         _isWarning1Printed=true;
00254       }
00255     }
00256     return retStr;
00257   }

00426   void printInitWarning() {
00427     if(!_isWarning2Printed) {
00428       std::cout << "BmlEventData - Warning: Object containing supplementary information not initialised. Will return dummy" << std::endl;
00429       _isWarning2Printed=true;
00430     } 
00431   }
